channel.title: Neural Networks Reading Group UoB
channel.description: Recent content on Neural Networks Reading Group UoB

item.title: Welcome to Neural Networks reading group website!
item.description: Hi everyone! I hope you are as excited as we are about this reading group. We thought weâ€™d make it more engaging by having a simple website where we can share links to the papers, post summaries and ideas. This is still a work in progress and feeback and suggestions are very much appreciated. For now, you can send your feedback to m.camaraescudero@bristol.ac.uk or to ys18223@bristol.ac.uk.

item.title: About
item.description: This website will be used as a repository of ideas, materials and discussions stemming out of the Neural Networks reading group at the University of Bristol. The reading group is organized by Mauro Camara Escudero and Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot.

item.title: Reading Group Location
item.description: We are currently talking to people regarding finding a permanent location where we could host our reading group. All updates will be posted here.
